message.name: ERR_WAITLIST_FV_TYPE_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: The Type must be entered.

message.name: ERR_WAITLIST_ENTRY_XRV_WAIT_LIST_ENTRY_DOES_NOT_EXIST
message.locale: The specified wait list entry does not exist.

message.name: ERR_WAITLIST_ENTRY_FV_POSITION_MUST_BE_POSITIVE
message.locale: Position must be greater than or equal to 1.

message.name: ERR_WAITLIST_ENTRY_FV_REMOVAL_REASON_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: The Removal Reason must be entered.

message.name: ERR_WAITLIST_ENTRY_XRV_POSITION_MUST_BE_LESS_THAN_OR_EQUAL_TO_LAST_ENTRY_POSITION
message.locale: The Position specified, %1n, must be less than or equal to the Position of the last entry +1, %2n.

message.name: ERR_WAITLIST_ENTRY_XRV_POSITION_SPECIFIED_MUST_BE_LESS_THAN_OR_EQUAL_TO_LAST_ENTRY_POSITION
message.locale: The Position specified, %1n, must be less than or equal to the Position of the last entry, %2n.

message.name: ERR_WAITLIST_ENTRY_XRV_NO_OPEN_ENTRIES
message.locale: There are no '%1c' entries in the wait list, the Position specified, %2n, must be 1.

message.name: ERR_WAITLIST_ENTRY_XRV_STATUS_OPEN_CANNOT_BE_MODIFIED
message.locale: This wait list entry is not '%1c', it cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_WAITLIST_ENTRY_XRV_STATUS_OPEN_CANNOT_BE_REMOVED
message.locale: This wait list entry is not '%1c', it cannot be removed.

message.name: ERR_WAITLIST_ENTRY_XRV_STATUS_OPEN_CANNOT_BE_ALLOCATED
message.locale: This wait list entry is not '%1c', it cannot be allocated.

message.name: ERR_WAITLIST_XRV_ALREADY_EXIST_FOR_THIS_RESOURCE_FOR_TYPE
message.locale: A wait list already exists for this resource for Type, %1c.

message.name: ERR_WAITLIST_ENTRY_XRV_ALREADY_EXIST_FOR_THIS_CLIENT
message.locale: This client, %1s, is already wait listed on the same wait list.

message.name: ERR_WAITLIST_XRV_WAIT_LIST_DOES_NOT_EXIST
message.locale: The specified wait list does not exist.

message.name: ERR_WAITLIST_ENTRY_XRV_NO_WAIT_LIST_ENTRY_FOR_CASE_PARTICIPANT
message.locale: No wait list entry exists for the specified case participant, %1s.

message.name: ERR_WAITLIST_ENTRY_XFV_SOME_SEARCH_CRITERIA_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: Search criteria must be entered.

message.name: ERR_WAITLIST_FV_RESOURCE_ID_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: The Resource ID must be entered.

message.name: ERR_WAITLIST_ENTRY_XRV_INVALID_CASE_PARTICIPANT_ROLE_ID
message.locale: The Case Participant Role ID is invalid.

message.name: ERR_WAITLIST_ENTRY_XRV_CANNOT_BE_ALLOCATED
message.locale: This wait list entry is '%1c', it cannot be allocated.

message.name: ERR_WAITLIST_ENTRY_XRV_CANNOT_BE_REMOVED
message.locale: This wait list entry is '%1c', it cannot be removed.

message.name: ERR_WAITLIST_ENTRY_XRV_CANNOT_BE_EXPIRED
message.locale: This wait list entry is '%1c', it cannot be expired.

message.name: ERR_WAITLIST_ENTRY_XFV_REVIEW_DATE_CANNOT_BE_AFTER_EXPIRY_DATE
message.locale: Review Date, %1d, must be before the expiry date,%2d.

message.name: ERR_WAITLIST_ENTRY_FV_REVIEW_DATE_MUST_BE_LATER_THAN_TODAY
message.locale: Review Date, %1d, must be later than today.

message.name: ERR_WAITLIST_ENTRY_FV_EXPIRY_DATE_MUST_BE_LATER_THAN_TODAY
message.locale: Expiry Date, %1d, must be later than today.
